queryprocess module¶

class queryprocess.QueryProcessor[source]¶

Bases: object

Class which contain methods to process the query and return the results

fetch_top_n(query, n=5)[source]¶

Fetch the best n documents out of all based on the tf-idf score.

Parameters

  • query (str) – Pre-processed query

  • n (int) – The number of relevant documents to be fetched

Returns

The best n documents based on tf-idf score.

Return type

list

get_docs(query)[source]¶

Retrieve the mongodb objects of the query word that contains the inverted index list along with the tf of that word. idf is also calculated and stored.

Parameters

query (list) – The preprocessed search query as a list of words.

Returns

key is the query word and the value is an object with the word’s idf and the inverted index list.

Return type

dict

jc_sim(sent, ref_words)[source]¶

Calculate Similarity score between the query and a sentence of the document :param sent: Sentence from the document :type sent: str :param ref_words: Preprocessed Query

Returns

Similarity score between the sentence and the query

Return type

int

process_query(query)[source]¶

Computes and retrieves the result of the query

Parameters

query (str) – The search query given by the user.

Returns

It contians the document paths and the best 5 sentences for the corresponding document .

Return type

list
